channel.title: Make something from this chord progression
channel.description:
I dug up something that might be fun to toy around with. It‚Äôs got a nice rhythm to it that invites funk, but really you can change it if your heart desires. I also included a lil bassline in there but that‚Äôs optional.
I cannot offer much except for perhaps the opportunity to just play around with the idea if you‚Äôre running low on creative juice
Anyways, [here it is.](https://app.auxy.co/projects/crkLRYyqaro60BRg6ReT2A==)
Have fun!

item.title: Make something from this chord progression
item.dc:creator: OIL
item.description:
Whatever that was? I cannot adequately describe what it did to my ears as I woke up from my nap. But I can sure try:

It was like being force-fed my favourite food, or being dissolved in opium-laced acid.

Whatever it was, see it through to the end. I want to know what this becomes.

Read full topic
